text: Digaula e helehelekai i nadau mehanga boloo, “Mmada, deelaa a mee! Goodou gu longono ana helekai hai baahi! Maa tangada dela ma ga daaligi a mee gii made, gei di king gaa wanga ana goloo e logowaahee gi mee, gei mee e hai lodo gi dana dama ahina, gei e dumaalia gi nia madahaanau o dono damana i nia hagadilinga dagitedi huogodoo.”
